sections.heading: college admission test; administered; expense
sections.text: No later than the 2017-18 school year, the State Department of Education shall administer a standard college admission test, selected by the State Board of Education, to students in the eleventh grade attending a public school in the state in lieu of the

79-759.Standard college admission test; administered; expense.

No later than the 2017-18 school year, the State Department of Education shall administer a standard college admission test, selected by the State Board of Education, to students in the eleventh grade attending a public school in the state in lieu of the assessment for the one grade in high school as required under section 79-760.03. The department shall pay the expenses of administering such college admission test.

SourceLaws 2011, LB637, § 26;Laws 2012, LB782, § 151;Laws 2014, LB967, § 7;Laws 2016, LB930, § 2;Laws 2021, LB528, § 28.
